actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-813.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #135 (228-174).

official_title: A resolution providing funds for the expenses of the Committee on House Administration to provide for the maintenance and improvement of ongoing computer services for the House of Representatives, for the investigation of additional computer services for the House of Representatives, and to provide computer support to the committees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #135 (228-174)) Authorizes the expenditure of funds, not to exceed $9,881,000, by the Committee on House Administration to enable the House Information Systems to provide for the operation, maintenance, and improvement of ongoing computer and information services for the House of Representatives. Prohibits any part of such funds from being available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1981.

titles.title: A resolution providing funds for the expenses of the Committee on House Administration to provide for the maintenance and improvement of ongoing computer services for the House of Representatives, for the investigation of additional computer services for the House of Representatives, and to provide computer support to the committees of the House of Representatives.
